languages.text: "Моя непокорная забава". {n}Голос друкарки журчит и переливается всеми оттенками жестокости.{/n} "Ты же не думал, что твой смешной побег из культа, что милостиво дал тебе прибежище после твоего изгнания, будет прощен?"

traits.locale_text: "Моя непокорная забава". {n}Голос друкарки журчит и переливается всеми оттенками жестокости.{/n} "Ты же не думал, что твой смешной побег из культа, что милостиво дал тебе прибежище после твоего изгнания, будет прощен?"
traits.speaker: Sinistroia

languages.text: "My rebellious toy." {n}Sinisthoria's voice rings with every imaginable shade of cruelty.{/n} "You did not honestly think your ridiculous escape from the Cult that had graciously given you refuge would be forgiven, did you?"
languages.original_text: "Моя непокорная забава". {n}Голос друкарки журчит и переливается всеми оттенками жестокости.{/n} "Ты же не думал, что твой смешной побег из культа, что милостиво дал тебе прибежище после твоего изгнания, будет прощен?"

traits.locale_text: "My rebellious amusement." {n}Sinisthoria's voice rings with every imaginable shade of cruelly.{/n} "You did not honestly think that your ridiculous escape from the cult that had graciously given you refuge would be forgiven, did you?"
traits.speaker: Sinistroia

traits.locale_text: "My rebellious toy." {n}Sinisthoria's voice rings with every imaginable shade of cruelly.{/n} "You did not honestly think your ridiculous escape from the cult that had graciously given you refuge would be forgiven, did you?"
traits.speaker: Sinistroia

traits.locale_text: "My rebellious toy." {n}Sinisthoria's voice rings with every imaginable shade of cruelly.{/n} "You did not honestly think your ridiculous escape from the Cult that had graciously given you refuge would be forgiven, did you?"
traits.speaker: Sinistroia

languages.text: "Mein rebellisches Spielzeug." {n}In Sinisthorias Stimme liegt jede nur vorstellbare Schattierung von Grausamkeit.{/n} "Ihr dachtet doch nicht wirklich, dass man Euch Eure lächerliche Flucht vor dem Kult, der Euch so gnädig Zuflucht gewährt hatte, einfach vergeben würde?"
languages.original_text: "My rebellious toy." {n}Sinisthoria's voice rings with every imaginable shade of cruelty.{/n} "You did not honestly think your ridiculous escape from the Cult that had graciously given you refuge would be forgiven, did you?"

traits.locale_text: "Mein rebellisches Spielzeug." {n}In Sinisthorias Stimme liegt jede nur vorstellbare Schattierung von Grausamkeit.{/n} "Ihr dachtet doch nicht wirklich, dass man Euch Eure lächerliche Flucht vor dem Kult, der Euch so gnädig Zuflucht gewährt hatte, einfach vergeben würde?"
traits.speaker: Sinistroia

languages.text: “我叛逆的小玩具。”{n}希斯索莉亚的声音中充斥着难以想象的残忍。{/n}“我的教派慷慨地为你提供了庇护，而你却以如此荒谬的方式逃了出去。你该不会真的以为，你做了这样的事情，还能得到原谅吧？”
languages.original_text: "My rebellious toy." {n}Sinisthoria's voice rings with every imaginable shade of cruelty.{/n} "You did not honestly think your ridiculous escape from the Cult that had graciously given you refuge would be forgiven, did you?"

traits.locale_text: “我叛逆的小玩具。”{n}希斯索莉亚的声音中充斥着难以想象的残忍。{/n}“我的教派慷慨地为你提供了庇护，而你却以如此荒谬的方式逃了出去。你该不会真的以为，你做了这样的事情，还能得到原谅吧？”
traits.speaker: Sinistroia

languages.text: « Mon esclave rebelle, {n}l'interpelle Sinisthoria d'une voix qui retentit comme un hymne à la cruauté.{/n} Vous ne pensiez tout de même pas que fuir le culte qui vous avait accueilli à bras ouverts vous serait pardonné ? »
languages.original_text: "My rebellious toy." {n}Sinisthoria's voice rings with every imaginable shade of cruelty.{/n} "You did not honestly think your ridiculous escape from the Cult that had graciously given you refuge would be forgiven, did you?"

traits.locale_text: « Mon esclave rebelle, {n}l'interpelle Sinisthoria d'une voix qui retentit comme un hymne à la cruauté.{/n} Vous ne pensiez tout de même pas que fuir le culte qui vous avait accueilli à bras ouverts vous serait pardonné ?
traits.speaker: Sinistroia

languages.text: «Mi juguetito rebelde». {n}La voz de Sinisthoria evoca toda clase de crueldades.{/n} «No pensarías que tu ridícula fuga del culto que te había proporcionado un refugio sería perdonada, ¿verdad?».
languages.original_text: "My rebellious toy." {n}Sinisthoria's voice rings with every imaginable shade of cruelty.{/n} "You did not honestly think your ridiculous escape from the Cult that had graciously given you refuge would be forgiven, did you?"

traits.locale_text: «Mi juguetito rebelde». {n}La voz de Sinisthoria evoca toda clase de crueldades.{/n} «No pensarías que tu ridícula fuga del culto que te había proporcionado un refugio sería perdonada, ¿verdad?».
traits.speaker: Sinistroia

languages.text: 「反抗的なおもちゃよ」{n}シニストリアの声は想像しうる全ての残忍さの影を含んでいる。{/n}「大いに世話をしてやった教団から、愚かにも逃亡できるなどと、よもや思っていないだろうな？」
languages.original_text: "My rebellious toy." {n}Sinisthoria's voice rings with every imaginable shade of cruelty.{/n} "You did not honestly think your ridiculous escape from the Cult that had graciously given you refuge would be forgiven, did you?"

traits.locale_text: 「反抗的なおもちゃよ」{n}シニストリアの声は想像しうる全ての残忍さの影を含んでいる。{/n}「大いに世話をしてやった教団から、愚かにも逃亡できるなどと、よもや思っていないだろうな？」
traits.speaker: Sinistroia

languages.text: "İsyankâr oyuncağım benim." {n}Sinisthoria'nın sesi, zalimliğin akla hayale gelebilecek her tonuyla çınlıyor.{/n} "Sana kollarını açan Tarikat'tan kaçma teşebbüsünün affedildiğini gerçekten düşünmüyorsundur, değil mi?"
languages.original_text: "My rebellious toy." {n}Sinisthoria's voice rings with every imaginable shade of cruelty.{/n} "You did not honestly think your ridiculous escape from the Cult that had graciously given you refuge would be forgiven, did you?"

traits.locale_text: "İsyankâr oyuncağım benim." {n}Sinisthoria'nın sesi, zalimliğin akla hayale gelebilecek her tonuyla çınlıyor.{/n} "Tarikat'ın sana cömertçe sunduğu korumayı bırakıp kaçma teşebbüsünün affedildiğini düşünmüyorsundur gerçekten, değil mi?"
traits.speaker: Sinistroia
